name: ENKAI (Mn8XR)
description:
This year, Unreal Engine 5 brought huge changes to game design and 3d computational power, including real-time fluid fx that have never before been possible. AI has also evolved rapidly to become a creative tool.

We created an alien water world on a lush jungle moon called Enkai. We are using AI on Enkai in several ways, including designing some of the features and characters in the experience, AI music, and AI voice.

* This is FAN art, and is not commercial in nature, and will not use anything from any movie or any direct content other than some blue characters and water. This Concept Art is created with Artificial Intelligence to make story crafting easier and more intuitive. for me. The actual 3d characters we are making are stylized Blueish beings right now, are not giant height, and won’t have tails (most likely). Some of our characters will have horns and all of them will have different skin colors and patterns than anything else.

If these Blue characters look at all familiar from a very famous movie, the original creator of those, maintains all their ownership, rights, etc. This is a fan game, because I waited so long and decided to make something myself as an homage while I wait. And if the creator of that movie, likes my fangame, artwork, storyline, music etc., I offer that all to him freely, from concept art and moodboards, to 3d assets and Unreal Engine 5 source files because what I am making is really neat, and I want to share it. Real time Fluid FX have never really been possible to do in a free Unreal Engine 5 game, and now it is!

I have combined my flight simulator Enkai DarkForces with Enkai so there is only one download to play MN8XR games in a 5GB free download. The CC Attribution credits are posted here - Dark Crusades — Mn8XR

We are looking for other XR artists and Unreal Engine Devs to collaborate to make a next-gen showcase. If you are interested, please contact us HERE asap, it’s moving fast!

We could use help from Character Artists, Character Animator, Painter Artist, Rigging and Mocap, AI Music creation, Unreal Engine Devs, Blueprint or C++ Coders, or Virtual Production enthusiasts who want their work in Cinematics and Games the next month or two.

Gratitude and thanks to our technology partners and supporters: FluidNinja VFX - Andras Ketzer, KAEDIM 3D, Midjourney, Hoffwerr, and Insectula. This is an initial showcase and BTS of our process with AI and applying AI to the design of interactive media.

We used a 2d image found on open source google search of a floating island, that I feed into the KAEDIM AI via Discord. Within 15 minutes I had a 30K poly low res 3d mesh that I sent to Insectula to detail in Zbrush and prepare in Unreal Engine 5 with Megascan assets, and dynamic vines and hanging structures that can be controlled by unified wind speed, direction, etc. This is stage one of KAEDIM to UE, and I am excited to share further results here as we integrate *FluidNinja Live! *Basically the rocket scientist of real-time fluid dynamics visualization :)

Credits and CC Attribution:

Enkai DarkForces - Free Fan Game for PC

Developed and Produced by: Anthony Bonnet XR Creative Director / Unreal Engine Developer Https://Mn8XR.com

This is a free Fan game, and is not for sale. All rights maintained by the original property rights owner. This game is not affiliated or endorsed by Star Wars, Disney, Avatar, or the Smurfs, and is an interactive fantasy fan game mashing different iconic pop culture visuals. This is for art, fun, learning, and because it didn't already exist, so I had to make it. Please do not get offended by mashing different multiverses or 3d models together.

I try to build these things as quickly as I can. We used Free CC Attribution 3d Models from Sketchfab.com to make this, and free tools like Blender and Unreal Engine 5, the best software in the world.

3D model credits are posted here: https://www.mn8xr.com/our-work/darkcrusades

We will remove any music or 3d model on request. Thanks to Patrick Peralta (aka Jet Scalawag) of Peralta Games for additional programming and support! Check out his games at:

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063802104673 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7Fk_Ng65pDDtRcQM7DfVww

"Free Mind Breaks Remix" by Dani Maal and Anthony Bonnet (Mn8XR) Original Vocals by TEMS

"Spacewhip" & "Tetropolis" courtesy of DJ Qbert https://www.thudrumble.com/ "Thani Flute Seven D" by Seven D and Thani Xuto https://soundcloud.com/sevend "Thani Flute Drop D" by DropD and Thani Xuto

Thanks to our generous supporters, some of the most advanced, intelligent developers on earth! AI and Real-time Fluid Dynamics!

KAEDIM 3D - https://www.kaedim3d.com Mubert AI - https://mubert.com/ NinjaFluid VFX - Andras Ketzer https://twitter.com/fluidninjavfx Insectula https://www.instagram.com/insectula_/

Follow on Facebook, Youtube, and Instagram.

THEJEDIZ FB PAGE https://www.facebook.com/TheJediz-100251765008642 DARKCRUSADES GAME FB PAGE https://www.facebook.com/DarkForces-105571357802801

My IG https://www.instagram.com/mn8.xr/

This is a free fan game and the models used are CC Attribution (licensed under Creative Commons Attribution) from Sketchfab. The idea is to either keep it as a fan game, or to replace the models to create something new later. I hope to find another programmer, developer, and character artist to help this evolve into something even more interesting for 2023!

Would you like to be in our next remix video? We combine 3d animation, VFX, video footage, and Unreal Engine, and seeking other VFX artists, dancers, and camera operators in South Florida.
